reference_summary:
20 PCS Zoostliss Nail Polish Remover Clips
Zoostliss
{'Brand': 'Zoostliss', 'Number of Items': '20', 'Unit Count': '20 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '6.6 x 5.1 x 1.8 inches; 3.99 Ounces'}
I got these nail polish remover because when ever I’m doing a soak off on a client or myself, I usually use a manicure bowl to soak them off but I find that when ever I’m doing that I’m wasting my acetone so I got these so that I won’t be wasting so much of my acetone. I gave this product 4 stars because the package did come kind of open and there was a very strong perfume like odor but I’ll just soak these in soap and barbecide.
Very nice but has an odor
Cortex International Black Series Duo Platinum 1.25-Inch & 0.5 Inch Travel Size Gemstone Infused Ceramic Plates Duet Flat Iron (Rose Wood)
Cortex

This hair straightener get is job done immediately, I only use the small straightener only thought just because I like to curl my bangs inwards, but yeah I love this straightener so much
Sleek and gets job done
LEAP Lemongrass Hand Soap, Natural & Moisturizing Lather, Gentle & Rinses Clean, Made with Organic Oils, Cruelty Free & Vegan, Liquid Hand Wash, Superbly Designed, 12 fl oz
Leap Organics
{'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'Leap Organics', 'Scent': 'Lemongrass', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.4 x 2.4 x 6.9 inches; 12 Ounces', 'UPC': '855920002692'}
The hand soap scent is not the best to me. After using this soap for a while the soap leaves a lemon grass smell mix with this other scent that I don’t know how to describe but I don’t really like the smell of the scent. The soap itself is great though the texture is more of a gooey slime feeling compare to other soaps that I have used
Weird texture

profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Preference for Efficiency**: The user continues to value products that enhance efficiency in beauty routines, actively seeking solutions that minimize waste, as demonstrated by their previous use of nail polish remover clips.

- **Professional Application**: Likely involved in professional nail care or beauty services, they utilize products for self-care and client interactions.

- **Practicality Over Aesthetics**: Functionality remains paramount for the user, prioritizing effective utility over aesthetic appeal. Their acceptance of products despite minor imperfections shows a practical mindset, though they maintain high standards, as illustrated by their recent review addressing undesirable scents.

- **Quality Expectations**: The user has a discerning eye for details and high-quality standards, which has been evident in their overall ratings, particularly favoring products that meet their needs.

- **Satisfaction with Room for Improvement**: They hold a balanced view on product performance, reflected in their past average rating of 4 stars. A recent perfect score for a hair straightener indicates appreciation for quality, while a lower rating for hand soap suggests nuanced feedback.

- **Diverse Tool Preferences**: The user remains open to exploring various beauty tools, appreciating utility across different categories. Their recent positive review for hair clips reflects a willingness to incorporate both efficiency and elegance into their beauty routine.

Overall, the user maintains a practical and efficiency-focused approach to beauty care, valuing functionality and quality while being discerning about product characteristics.
